Judul: Generative Art Images by Complex Functions Based Genetic Algorithm
Abstrak:
This paper presents a novel computer supported design system
which uses computational approach to producing 3D images for stimulating
creativity of designers. It put forward generic algorithm based on a binary tree
to generate 3D images. This approach is illustrated by an artwork design
example, which uses general complex function expressions to form 3D images
of artistic flowers. It shows that approach is able to generate some innovative
solutions and demonstrates the power of computational approach.
Kata Kunci: Generative Art Images, Functions Based Genetic, Algorithm
Sumber: Liu, H., Liu, X., 2007, in IFIP International Federation for Information Processing, Volume 250, Trends in Computer Aided Innovation, ed. Leon-Rovira, N., (Boston: Springer), pp. 125-134.
